body.name: HOROW HT100S Small Toilet 25" L x 13.4" W x 28.4" H One Piece Short Toilet for Compact Bathroom, Tiny Mini Space Saving Toilet with Soft Closing Seat, White Toilet Bowl
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 15 hrs
features: Modern Compact One-Piece Design: Perfectly fit for a small bathroom. The toilet seat is 16.5'' length, 2'' shorter than an elongated toilet seat. 25 inch Depth from the wall to the end. Space saver. The seat height is 16.5'', it's a good height for Short/Medium people.

Easy to Install: This short 1-piece toilet have two big opening holes on the side to fix the toilet much easier. Package includes toilet, soft closing toilet seat, pre-installed flush valve, high-quality wax ring, floor bolts, and also installation instruction.

Small but Mighty: Fully Glazed Siphon Flush. Self Cleaning Spray. Super-Quiet and powerful flush with no clogs. Leak-proof. Highly efficient Dual-Flush 1.1 GPF or higher(1.6gpf), save your water bill daily.

Soft Close & Quick Release: This bathroom toilet seat adopts a slow cover design just press the toilet lid lightly. No slam & no noise, you don’t need to bend down, and don't worry about noise affecting the baby’s sleeping. The soft closing seat with a stainless steel durable hinge, easy to get the toilet seat off to tighten or clean after years of use.

Life-Time After-Sales Service: HOROW values each customer’s shopping experience and believes in the quality of our products, therefore our toilets comes with lifetime after-sales service and 1 year limited warranty. Our customer service center will respond to messages within 12 hours
Certification: cUPC,UPC and Water Sense certified. CEC compliant. cUPC certified water flush valve

Note: This toilet is designed for floor mounting, 10” Rough-in. It works for U.S. standard 7/8'' waterline. An adapter for 1/2'' waterline is pre-installed. The toilet for 12'' Rough-in is also listed, please choose the correct one for your bathroom plumbings
body.description: HOROW 10" ROUGH-IN ONE PIECE TOILET This Specific Toilet Designed For 10" Rough-in White dual flush round 10-inch rough-in toilet with soft close seat water closet. Quality construction with small elegant design. 10" rough-in toilet is a contemporary and compact design. Although designed for very small spaces, this small toilet looks perfect in every modern bathroom. The seat-lid closes silently. The dual-flush feature is ideal for water conservation.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: ABOUT HOROW Better HOROW, Better Life HOROW 10" ROUGH-IN ONE PIECE TOILET This Specific Toilet Designed For 10" Rough-in White dual flush round 10-inch rough-in toilet with soft close seat water closet. Quality construction with small elegant design. 10" rough-in toilet is a contemporary and compact design. Although designed for very small spaces, this small toilet looks perfect in every modern bathroom. The seat-lid closes silently. The dual-flush feature is ideal for water conservation.

Easy To Clean The small toilet glazed surface is self-cleaning, simplifying maintenance. It is very easy to reach for cleaning. Compact toilet skirted design, easier to maintain versus a two-piece toilet. Powerful & Quiet Dual Fush The high efficiency quiet dual flush average 1.28GPF, super-quiet, and powerful flush with no clogs. Save more water than a regular single flush every year. The flushing mechanism is made of superior ABS material, corrosion-resistant, aging resistance. Soft Closing Seat Compared to noisy traditional toilet seats, a soft close seat creates almost no noise, making it a great choice to ensure privacy in your bathroom. The quiet sound of these seats is useful for families with small children who have particular trouble with closing seats properly without losing their grip.

Quick Release Seat Push-button removable seat - quick release, which makes it easy to install. Designed for this small toilet, our easy-release seat features three steps of operating - click, remove, and install, just where you need it, for drive away dirty, no matter when you want to change it. Space Saver Design Perfectly fit for a small bathroom. The size is 25'' L x13.4'' W x 28.4'' H", 25'' inch Depth from the wall to the end. Modern compact design to save the space needed. Two Sizes of Supply Line Inlet Hose Our toilet fits both 7/8'' water line and 1/2'' water line. If your supply line size is 1/2", you could directly connect your water line to the toilet. If your supply line size is 7/8", please screw off the adapter, then connect it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works surprisingly well! Nice and compact, and doesn’t clog!
reviews.reviewText: Wow! We are pleasantly surprised that it hasn’t clogged, especially with how little water it uses! Even the “Serial Clogger” in our house has not plugged this tiny toilet, stating “It must be really well engineered!”We originally bought this toilet as it was the only one that was in stock and would fit in our small space (we needed a shallow depth/not long one so we could still be able to open the bathroom door). It was a bit risky as we have never heard of the brand, but we didn’t have another choice. We had a professional plumber install it, and they didn’t seem to have any problems.I will admit that the inside of the bowl looks intimidatingly small, like it won’t be able to pass anything other than a child-sized BM. Shockingly it has handled all it has been dropped in one flush. ONE FLUSH!The height seems fine, not short not tall, but average. The overall look of it is on the modern side and the porcelain is bright white (If I had a choice, it would have been for something less modern looking and less bright white). The one-piece design of it makes it super easy to clean.**My only gripe is the flimsy plastic toilet seat. It makes the whole thing seem much cheaper than it should. Oh well.It’s mean to flush poop and pee and it does all of that like a champ!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This toilet works extremely well. It consistently flushes much more reliably than the old full size water hog that it replaced. It is perfect for small spaces, it looks terrific and it was easy to install. Horow customer service is also first rate, with quick responses to questions and a willingness to work with you in the event of difficulty. I wouldn't hesitate to purchase another of these or any other toilets or accessories from Horow if the need ever arose.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 17, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So far I like it / and after a month I love it.
reviews.reviewText: it's small but tall enough, 16.5 inches not including the seat. I like the seat. you can remove the seat completely and it is slow to close, both the lid and seat. Standard toilet fluid master fill valve will fit, plush valve appears proprietary but it good so far. It was easy enough to set like I have always set a toilet, wax ringson floor, bolts in, double nutted, then hover the toilet over the bolts and set it down on the wax. Functions perfectly so far. Tightening closet bolts was NO PROBLEM just use an open end wrench. No need to cover the closet bolts as there is access covers that easily cover the hole where you tighten the closet bolts down.______One month later... Perfect toilet after using it NOT EVEN ONE CLOG. Have not had to use the plunger.My local supply house did not have a 10 inch to wall toilet, it was to be a special order. So I found this toilet and it looks nice, glazed inside and out. No flaws seen and I looked for them. I have installed hundreds of toilets in both commercial and residential locations but this one is for me and it's terrific. The toilet seat can be completely removed by pressing a button, it just comes off and can be installed after cleaning just as quickly.Finish, packing of product, price, function, AVAILABILITY!Wish it was USA made.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars It’s not high enough the seat is very small
reviews.reviewText: The ball is very small I don’t like it you can’t reach behind it and flush it when you’re sitting down but there’s nothing I can do if I want to replace it I have to buy another whole toilet and pay $250 to put it in and I’ll just put up with this one for two or three years and then get a new one I bought one and it was 12 inch round instead of 10 and the plumber said it wouldn’t fit so I had to buy this 10 inch round in a hurry and it came and I think it’s too small, but I’m using it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Toilet sit is small
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. The toilet sit is small and it doesn’t fit. It moves anytime you sit on it. I really hate it now. Can I get a replacement. I wish I can replace the whole toilet.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for the day care!!
reviews.reviewText: Great smaller toilet for our Day Care kidsPerfect for boys that need to work on their aim.Easy to clean because there are no crevices for stuff to get inLid won't bite fingers, soft slow close

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 17, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I love how it fits into my small bathroom. I like the option of 2 flushes. My only problem is the seat. The local hardware store only carry round and oblong seats for a replacement. This is more square which feels awkward the first few times you use it. I’m worried about replacement seat availability in the USA.
